name: KeepMePositive
0:
”Alexa, Keep Me Positive.”
”Alexa, open keep me positive.”
”Alexa, open keep me positive and help me stay positive.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: keep me positive
Developer Terms of Use
des: In these trying times, when we feel that negativity, chaos, hate, anger and intolerance are raining down on us every day, Keep Me Positive is a daily tool to help us start the day on a positive note, lift us up during the course of the day and retire at night knowing there is hope for tomorrow.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
